page.title: 14CATON LEISURE CLUB
page.content: he club was founded in January 1983,so hat adults of any age could meet weekly,make friends and practise skills under the guidance of volunteer leaders most of whom live in the village.Many are professionally qualified,some are enthusiastic,knowledgeable amateurs.The yearly 1 pound subscription and 25p attendance charge cover rent of YMCA premises,equipment and refreshments.The Parish Council donated 120 pounds and we recently won 3rd prize in the Lancashire Village Ventures competition -300 pounds and a great boost to morale. The Club is run by an elected Committee and has 80 members,most,but not all,over 50.We meet on Mondays and Tuesdays from September to June.Groups vary from 6 to 30+.At present subjects include Music+Movement,Indoor Bowls, Swimming,Painting and Picture Framing, Sewing,Debating,Bridge and Geology.
